name: Mixing/Processing
description: Large tanks with high-shear mixers and homogenizers under temperature/vacuum control.

name: Transfer/Holding
description: Pumps to buffer tanks for holding before bottling.

name: Filling/Capping
description: Automated filling and capping machines for precise volumes and secure seals.

name: Finishing/QC
description: Labeling, checkweighers, QC (viscosity, pH) before packing.
